N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 187.3 - Application for approval of safety program

State Regulations

An organization desirous of obtaining approval of its work
training program shall submit an application on a form prescribed by the
commissioner. The application shall be filed with the commissioner and a copy
shall be filed with the State Education Department. Such application shall
include, but not be limited to, the following: (a) Description of the
organization. (b) Description of
the shop safety program and the methods of teaching shop safety, including the
curriculum for teaching shop safety. (c) The nature and type of machinery used in
the training program. (d) Qualifications of the teachers giving safety instructions. (e) The methods used in evaluating the
performance of minors receiving safety instruction and in determining whether
the minor has successfully completed the training program. (f) The number of hours a week and the number
of weeks the minor participates in the training program and receives safety
instruction. Notes
